strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<se_def>Ishmahri: The power of the great Moonshadow harp will awaken the ancient ship.
<se_def>Ishmahri: You will find it somewhere along the path you have already trodden. A friend in your debt will guide you to it.
<se_def>Ishmahri: Go now on your quest. May the moon watch over you and keep you safe...
